long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide Yo Links Buddy
Your private, pin-protected bookmark manager!

Hide Yo Links Buddy is the fun and easy way to keep your favorite links private. Whether you're bookmarking personal websites, work-related pages, or anything in between, this free app lets you store and access your bookmarks securely with a PIN.

Key Features:
Private Bookmark Storage: Add, remove, and manage your links in a secure, PIN-protected environment.
Custom PIN Protection: Set and update your personal PIN for easy, private access.
Search & Filter: Quickly find your saved links with a powerful search and filtering feature.
Free to Use: Enjoy all features without any costs or subscriptions.
Perfect for users who want a simple, fun, and private way to organize and protect their bookmarks. Try it today and keep your links safe from prying eyes!
